page.title: 04ROUGH HEY INDUSTRIAL SITE
page.content:
We investigated the large Telecom storage depot on the edge of the Trading Estage. It stores all the cable and equipment used by the Telecom engineers. Soon it will store all telephones.
We visited other firms on the estate. One was Scaffolding Great Britain and another was Leisure scaffolding which supplies seating accommodation for outside events such as Pop Concerts, Golfing Tournaments and other large spectator events.
Other buildings at Rough Hey include a large National Carrier depot, the Tilcon Cement Mixer firm and an Express Carrier repair garage. We returned to school down Longridge Road and the railway line.
